Tallahassee.Flagler College \u2013 Tallahassee Campu: Flagler College-Tallahassee is located in Florida’s capital city, serving as a branch of the St. Augustine-based private four-year liberal arts college. The satellite campus, hosted through Tallahassee Community College, commenced in 2000 as the product of a legislative mandate to expand opportunities for four year degree-seeking students.
